title: Market a Commercial Property for Lease
description: An agent needs to market a vacant industrial warehouse space.

tasks.description: Create a listing on commercial real estate platforms like LoopNet and CREXi.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a detailed and accurate listing.

tasks.description: Design an email marketing blast to send to a list of local commercial brokers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a professional email flyer for the property.

tasks.description: Send the email blast and track the open and click-through rates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the marketing email and monitors its performance.
